TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SessionStateStoreData extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 表示会话存储的会话状态数据。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>类由 ASP.NET 和自定义会话状态存储的实施者来回传递会话状态信息<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>类用于表示会话存储到的会话状态数据<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。 <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>对象包含的会话状态变量名称和值，静态对象引用和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A>当前会话的信息。

MemberSignature.Value: public SessionStateStoreData (System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection sessionItems, System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection staticObjects, int timeout);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection sessionItems, class System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection staticObjects, int32 timeout) cil managed
Public Sub New (sessionItems As ISessionStateItemCollection, staticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection, timeout As Integer)
public: SessionStateStoreData(System::Web::SessionState::ISessionStateItemCollection ^ sessionItems, System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ staticObjects, int timeout);
new System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData : System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection * System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection * int -> System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData

Docs.param: 当前会话的会话变量和值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>类用于表示会话存储到的会话状态数据<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。 <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>对象包含的会话状态变量名称和值，静态对象引用和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Timeout%2A>当前会话的信息。
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>类由 ASP.NET 和自定义会话状态存储的实施者来回传递会话状态信息<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateModule>。
自定义会话存储实施者构造<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData>的实现中的对象<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItem%2A>， <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.GetItemExclusive%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreProviderBase.CreateNewStoreData%2A>方法。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection Items { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection Items
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property Items As ISessionStateItemCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::SessionState::ISessionStateItemCollection ^ Items { System::Web::SessionState::ISessionStateItemCollection ^ get(); };
member this.Items : System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection

Docs.summary: 当前会话的会话变量和值。
Docs.value: 包含当前会话的变量和值的 对象。

remarks.format:
## Remarks <xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.Items%2A>属性引用向 ASP.NET 应用程序代码使用公开的会话状态变量<xref:System.Web.SessionState.HttpSessionState>类，该类使用访问<xref:System.Web.HttpContext.Session%2A>属性的当前<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>或<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>实例。
默认情况下，使用管理会话状态变量<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateItemCollection>对象。 自定义会话存储实施者可以提供自己实现<xref:System.Web.SessionState.ISessionStateItemCollection>接口。

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection StaticObjects { get; }
.property instance class System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection StaticObjects
Public Overridable ReadOnly Property StaticObjects As HttpStaticObjectsCollection
public: virtual property System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ StaticObjects { System::Web::HttpStaticObjectsCollection ^ get(); };
member this.StaticObjects : System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection

Docs.summary: 获取由 ASP.NET 应用程序文件 Global.asax 中的 标记声明的对象的集合。
Docs.value: 一个 ，它包含在 Global.asax 文件中声明的对象。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 必须向
<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A> 提供属性是为了与 ASP 的早期版本兼容。
自定义会话存储实施者可以获得对引用<xref:System.Web.HttpStaticObjectsCollection>当前类<xref:System.Web.HttpContext>实例使用<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateUtility.GetSessionStaticObjects%2A>方法。
> [!NOTE] > 自定义对象存储在<xref:System.Web.SessionState.SessionStateStoreData.StaticObjects%2A>集合必须支持二进制序列化。 有关详细信息，请参阅[二进制序列化](~/docs/standard/serialization/binary-serialization.md)。

.property instance int32 Timeout
Public Overridable Property Timeout As Integer
public: virtual property int Timeout { int get(); void set(int value); };

Docs.summary: 获取并设置在会话状态提供程序终止会话之前各请求之间所允许的时间（以分钟为单位）。
Docs.value: 超时期限（以分钟为单位）。
